Desc.entry: Private allotments belonging to the church diocese. Open to new members and associate members. No animals can be kept on the allotments except poultry. Offers low cost seed and gardening supplies. Subscription for non-members which includes access to the low cost seeds.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Sat & Sun 10am-12noon (Feb-Sep), Sat 10am-12noon (Oct-Jan, closed for stocktaking in Dec)
